item.description:
Looks like possibly nice weather. All levels of ability are welcome. Bring water. Meet at the center bleachers if you are comiong for the first time.

The website is not letting me post Conard as the location. Most people know where it is. If you need help, contact me.

Call me at 860-559-7983 with questions or comments. See you there.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis at Conard - Beechwood Rd., West Hartford
